data.name: Space Ranger Appleseed
data.detailed_description:
Story

It is the year 2040, earth has successfully planted an orchard on the distant moon 'Moonapple'.
Your job as a Space Ranger will be to help it achieve its bumper harvests, despite the harsh Moon environment.
Ranger Cuthbert on the Space Station will guide you through the many tasks ahead.

Gameplay

Space Ranger Appleseed is a third person 3D platformer where you are a Space Ranger managing a moon orchard.

Among the many missions awaiting you will be:
  • Keep the moon orchards running with water and power & collect the apples when they are ripe.
  • Fly your Spaceship around the moon, ensuring no asteroids or other things will impact the facilities
  • Bring the apples to the Space station for processing & selling.
  • Drive around the moon, repairing communications and Orchard facilities when needed.

In Summary

The mission is yours to take!
Drive spaceships, ride moon buggies and trudge across the vast distances of space to ensure a bumper crop of apples gets made!

data.short_description: Become a Space Ranger, guarding a Space Orchard. Fly across asteroid belts, drive across dusty moonscapes & liase with the Space station to get your bumper crop of space apples ready!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 7 x64 or newer
  • Processor: x64 dual core 1.8GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete non-Mobile GPU with at least 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: x64 dual core 1.8GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete non-Mobile GPU with at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
